cheese_id.description: Unique identifier for each cheese item

cheese_name.description: Name of the cheese (e.g., Cheddar, Brie, Gouda)

cheese_type.description: Category of cheese (e.g., Hard, Soft, Semi-soft, Blue)

origin_country.description: Country of origin for the cheese

milk_type.description: Type of milk used (e.g., Cow, Goat, Sheep, Buffalo)

quantity_kg.description: Current quantity in stock measured in kilograms

aging_months.description: Number of months the cheese has been aged

production_date.description: Date when the cheese was produced

expiry_date.description: Expected expiry date of the cheese

storage_location.description: Physical location where the cheese is stored (e.g., Warehouse A, Cold Room 3)

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last inventory update

description: Main table containing cheese inventory data
